text: In January 2016, Department of Homeland Security (DHS), Federal Protective Service (FPS), the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) that authority to provide protective security services for GSA-owned or leased facilities resides with DHS. Secretary DHS delegated authority to FPS and protective security services must be acquired through FPS.

As the is now complete, IRM

Security Guard and Explosive Detector Dog Services and Programs formally administered through IRS guard services is no longer applicable. For inquiries refer to Federal Protective Service or contact your local FMSS Security Section Chief.

In response, IRS phased transition of guard services culminating in December 2019. As the is now complete, IRM 10.2.12 Security Guard and Explosive Detector Dog Services and Programs formally administered through IRS guard services is no longer applicable. For inquiries refer to Federal Protective Service or contact your local FMSS Security Section Chief.
